In Pakistan, angry over a film mocking the Prophet Muhammad, protesters set fire to cinemas, banks and cars in Karachi.
In Somalia, a Mogadishu hospital treats those wounded in an attack Thursday by suicide bombers.
China's state media releases a video showing Chinese forces conducting a landing drill in an area claimed by China and Japan.
In Georgia, an abuse scandal forces the resignation of the prisons minister and his successor promises to treat prisoners with respect.
In Germany, more than 20 years after the fall of the Berlin wall, a Berlin art exhibit shows what life was like when the city was divided.
And in France, the country's highest court rejects a request by animal rights groups to ban bullfighting.
